juzs.text: 25|21|Bu xiwang yu wo xiang hui zhe ceng shuo:“Zenme bu shi zhong tianshi jianglin women, huo zhe de jian women de zhu ne?” Tamen que yi wangzizunda, que yi danibudao.
25|22|Tamen kanjian zhong tianshi de rizi, fanzui zhe jiang meiyou hao xiaoxi, zhong tianshi yao dui tamen shuo:“(Leyuan duiyu nimen) shi ying wei yanjin de.”
25|23|Wo jiang chuli tamen suo xing de shangong, er shi ta bian cheng feiyang de huichen.
25|24|Zai na ri, leyuan de jumin jiang zai yige zui you de juzhu di, yige zuimei de xiuxi zhi suo.
25|25|Zai na ri, zhu tian jiang yu baiyun yidao polie, zhong tianshi jiang fengming zhuangyan di jianglin.
25|26|Zai na ri, zhenshi de zhuquan shi shuyu zhiren zhu de. Na ri, dui bu xindao zhe shi yige yanku de rizi.
25|27|Zai na ri, bu yi zhe yimian yao shou yimian shuo:“A! Dan yuan wo ceng yu shizhe caiqu tongyi daolu.
25|28|A! Ai zai! Dan yuan wo meiyou yi mou renwei pengyou.
25|29|Jinian ji jianglin zhihou, ta que yi shi wo beiqi ta.” Emo xianglai shi yiqi ren de.
25|30|Shizhe ceng shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de zongzu yi zhe “gulanjing” wei qi wu.”
25|31|Wo zheyang shi mei ge xianzhi, dou you yixie zuiren zuo ta de choudi, ni de zhu zu wei yindao zhe he yuanzhu zhe.
25|32|Bu xindao zhe ceng shuo:“Zenme bu ba quanbu “gulanjing” yici jiang shi ta ne?” Wo nayang ling ling xingxing di jiang shi ta, yibian wo ping ta lai jianding ni de xin. Wo zhujian jiang shi ta.
25|33|Tamen mei xiang ni tichu yi zhong feinan, wo jiu qishi ni zhenli he geng meiman de jieshi.
25|34|Naxie bei pufuzhe jihe yu huo yu zhe di diwei geng elie, shi pianli zhenglu geng yuan de.
25|35|Wo que yi ba jingdian shangci mu sa, bingqie renming ta di gege ha lun zuo ta de zhushou.
25|36|Wo shuo:“Ni lia qu jiaohua naxie fouren wo de jixiang de minzhong.” Zuizhong wo huimiele tamen.
25|37|Nu ha de zongzu fouren shizhe de shihou, wo yan sile tamen, bingqie yi tamen wei shiren de jianjie. Wo yi wei bu yi zhe zhunbeile tongku de xingfa.
25|38|A de ren, sai mo de ren, lan si de jumin, yiji zai tamen zhiqian de ruogan shidai,
25|39|wo yi wei mei yi shidai de ren chanmingguo xuduo biyu, wo huimiele mei yi shidai de ren.
25|40|Tamen que yi jingli na zao e yu de chengshi, nandao tamen meiyou kanjian ta ma? Buran, tamen bu xiwang fuhuo.
25|41|Dang tamen kanjian ni de shihou, zhi ba ni dang zuo xiaobing,(tamen shuo):“Zhe jiushi an la paiqian lai dang shizhe de ma?
25|42|Yao bushi women jianchizhe yao chongbai women de shenling, name, ta jihu shi women pianli tamenle.” Tamen kanjian xingfa de shihou, jiangyao zhidao shei shi pianli zhenglu de.
25|43|Ni gaosu wo ba, yi siyu wei qi shenling zhe, ni neng zuo ta de jianhu zhe ma?
25|44|Nandao ni yiwei tamen daban shi neng tingcong huozhe neng liaojie de ren ma? Tamen zhi xiang shengchu yiyang, tamen shenzhi shi geng mi wu de.
25|45|Nandao ni meiyou kanjian ni de zhu zenyang shenzhan yinying ma? Jiaruo ta yiyu, ta biding shi yinying chengwei jingzhi de. Wo yi taiyang wei qi biaozhi,
25|46|ranhou wo zhujian de shouhui yinying.
25|47|Zhu yi heiye wei nimen de yifu, yi shuimian gong nimen anxi, yi baizhou gong nimen suxing.
25|48|Zhu zai jiang en zhiqian, shi feng xian lai fu xi. Wo cong tianshang jiangxia qingjie de yushui,
25|49|yibian wo jie yushui er shi yi si de dadi fuhuo, bingyong yushui gong wo suo chuangzao de shengchu he renmen zuo yinliao.
25|50|Wo que yi ba yushui fen pei zai tamen zhi jian, yibian tamen jiyi. Dan tamen daban zhi yuan wang'enfuyi.
25|51|Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi zai mei zuo chengshi zhong paiqian yige jinggao zhe.
25|52|Suoyi ni buyao shuncong bu xindao zhe, ni yingdang jie ci “gulanjing” er yu tamen nuli fendou.
25|53|Ta jiushi ren liang hai ziyou jiaoliu de, zhe shi hen tian de shui, na shi hen ku de xian shui; ta zai liang hai zhi jian shezhi pingzhang he tifang.
25|54|Ta jiushi yong jing shui chuangzao ren, shi ren chengwei xuezu he yinqin de. Ni de zhu shi quanneng de.
25|55|Tamen she an la er chongbai naxie dui tamen ji wu fu you wu huo de dongxi, bu xindao zhe shi jili fankang ziji de zhu de.
25|56|Wo zhi paiqian ni wei baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe.
25|57|Ni shuo:“Wo duiyu wancheng zhe xiang shiming, bu xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou, dan wang youzhi zhe neng you ci dadao dadao qi zhuzai.”
25|58|Ni yingdang tuo kao yongsheng bu mie de zhu, ni yingdang zansong ta chaojue wanwu. Ta zuyi che zhi ziji pu minmen de zuiguo.
25|59|Ta zai liu rinei chuangzao tiandi wanwu, ranhou sheng shang baozuo, ta shi zhiren de zhu. Ni yingdang yi ta qingjiao jingming zhe.
25|60|Ruguo youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen yingdang wei zhiren zhu er koutou.” Tamen jiu shuo:“Zhiren zhu shi shenme? Nandao women yin feng ni de mingling er koutou ma?” Na shi tamen gengjia fangan.
25|61|Shengjie zai an la! Ta ba xuduo gong zao zai tianshang, youzao mingdeng he canlan de yueliang.
25|62|Ta jiushi wei yu juewu huo yu ganxie zhe, er shi zhouye gengdie de.
25|63|Zhiren zhu de puren shi zai dadishang qianxun er xing de; dang yuren yi e yan shanghai tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhu nimen ping'an.”
25|64|Tamen wei ziji de zhu er tongxiao koutou he li zhan;
25|65|tamen chang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni wei women bi kai huo yu de xingfa. Huo yu de xingfa que shi ling ren feichang tongku de,
25|66|que shi elie de zhuchu he jusuo.”
25|67|Tamen yong qian de shihou, ji bu huihuo, you bu linse, jin shou zhong dao;
25|68|tamen zhi qidao an la, bu qidao bie de shenling; tamen bu weibei an la de jinling er sharen, chufei yi zhenli (changming); tamen ye bu tongjian. Shei fan ci lei (zui'e), shei zao chengfa;
25|69|fuhuo ri yao shou jiabei de xingfa, er shouru de yong ju qizhong.
25|70|Wei huiguo erqie xindao bing xingshan zhe, an la jiang gouxiao qi zuixing, er luqu qi shangong. An la shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.
25|71|Huiguo erqie xingshan zhe, que yi zhuanxiang an la.
25|72|Tamen bu zuojia jianzheng, tamen ting dao e yan de shihou qianxun de zou kai.
25|73|Youren yi tamen de zhu de jixiang quan jie tamen de shihou, tingjiang zhe bing bu zhuang long zuo xia de zai dahan.
25|74|Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni yi women de qi zi er nu wei women de anwei, qiu ni yi women wei jingwei zhe de dianfan.”
25|75|Zhe deng ren neng jianren, yinci jiang shou gaoji de baochou, tamen zai leyuan li, jiang tingjian zhushou he zhu an.
25|76|Tamen jiang yong ju qizhong. Leyuan shi youmei de zhuchu he jusuo.
25|77|Ni shuo:“Jiaruo meiyou nimen de qidao, wo de zhu bing bu guanqie nimen, dan nimen ji yi fouren zhenli, nimen jianglai yao shou wufa jietuo de xingfa.”
26|1|Ta xin, mi mu,
26|2|zhexie shi mingbai de jingdian de jie wen.
26|3|Yinwei tamen bu xindao, ni huoxu qi de yao si.
26|4|Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiang cong tianshang jiang shi tamen yige jixiang, tamen jiu wei ta er fushou tie er.
26|5|Mei feng you xin de jinian cong zhiren zhu jiang shi tamen, tamen dou beiqi ta.
26|6|Tamen que yi fouren zhenli, tamen suo chaoxiao de shi de jieju, jiang jianglin tamen.
26|7|Nandao tamen meiyou guancha da di ma? Wo shi ge zhong youliang de zhiwu zai da dishang fanyan.
26|8|Ci zhong que you yige jixiang. Dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de.
26|9|Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
26|10|Dangri, ni de zhu zhaohuan mu sa (shuo):“Ni qu jiaohua na bu yi de minzhong.
26|11|Ji falao de minzhong. Tamen zenme bu jingwei an la ni?”
26|12|Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo dique pa tamen fouren wo,
26|13|yizhi wo fanmen kouchi, suoyi qiu ni paiqian ha lun (he wo yidao qu).
26|14|Tamen ceng jia zui yu wo, wo pa tamen shahai wo.”
26|15|Zhu shuo:“Jue bu ruci, ni lia daizhe wo de jixiang qu ba! Wo que shi yu nimen zai yiqi ting (nimen de bianlun) de.
26|16|Ni lia dao falao nali shuo:‘Women que shi zhong shijie de zhu de shizhe,
26|17|qing ni shifang yiselie de houyi, rang wo lia dai tamen qu.’”
26|18|Falao shuo:“Nandao women meiyou zai women de jiazhong ba ni zi you fuyang chengren, erqie ni zai women jiazhong douliuguo xuduo nian ma?
26|19|Ni ceng ganle ni suo gan di na jian shi, ni shi wang'en de.”
26|20|Ta shuo:“Dangri, wo bu dongshi di ganle na jian shi.
26|21|Wo jiu weiju nimen, er taobi nimen, suihou, wo de zhu ba zhihui shangci wo, bingqie paiqian wo wei shizhe,
26|22|ni zebei wo wang'en, ni suowei de en shi ni ceng nuyi yiselie de houyi.”
26|23|Falao shuo:“Zhong shijie de zhu shi shenme?”
26|24|Ta shuo:“Ta shi tiandi wanwu de zhu, ruguo nimen shi quexin zhe.”
26|25|Falao dui ta zuoyou de ren shuo:“Nimen zenme bu qingting ne?”
26|26|Ta shuo:“(Ta shi) nimen de zhu, yeshi nimen zuxian de zhu.”
26|27|Falao shuo:“Fengming lai jiaohua nimen de zhe wei shizhe, que shi yige fengzi.”
26|28|Ta shuo:“(Ta shi) dongfang he xifang, yiji jie hu dongxi zhi jian de zhu, ruguo nimen neng liaojie.”
26|29|Falao shuo:“Ruguo ni she wo er jing shi bie de shenling, wo shibi shi ni bian cheng yige qiufan.”
26|30|Ta shuo:“Yaoshi wo zhaoshi ni yige mingzheng ne?”
26|31|Falao shuo:“Ruguo ni shi shuo shihua de, ni jiu zhaoshi yige mingzheng ba!”
26|32|Ta jiu reng xia ta de shouzhang, na tiao shouzhang huran bian cheng yitiao mang;
26|33|ta ba ta de shou chou chulai, na zhi shou zai guanzhong de yanqian huran xiande bailiang liang de.
26|34|Falao dui ta de zuoyou de guizumen shuo:“Zhe que shi yige gaoming de shushi,
26|35|ta xiang ping ta de moshu, ba nimen zhu chu guojing, nimen you she me jianyi ne?”
26|36|Tamen shuo:“Qing ni kuanxian ta he ta di gege, bing pai zhengmu yuan dao ge chengshi qu,
26|37|tamen hui ba suoyou gaoming de shushi dou zhao dao ni zheli lai.”
26|38|Shushimen zai zhiding de riqi, yi zhiding de shijian jihe qilai.
26|39|Youren dui minzhong shuo:“Nimen jihe qilaile ma?
26|40|Ruguo shushimen huosheng, women huoxu shuncong tamen.”
26|41|Shushimen lai dao de shihou, tamen dui falao shuo:“Ruguo women desheng, women bi shou baochou ma?”
26|42|Ta shuo:“Shi de, zai na shi, nimen bi meng chongxing.”
26|43|Mu sa dui tamen shuo:“Nimen keyi pao xia nimen suoyao pao de dongxi.”
26|44|Tamen jiu pao xiale tamen de sheng he zhang, tamen shuo:“Zhi falao de quanli fashi, women biran desheng.”
26|45|Mu sa jiu reng xia ta de shouzhang, na tiao shouzhang huran tun xia tamen suo huanhua de (dashe).
26|46|Shushimen jiu baidao xiaqu.
26|47|Tamen shuo:“Women yi xinyang zhong shijie de zhu——
26|48|mu sa he ha lun de zhu.”

26|49|Falao shuo:“Wo hai meiyou yunxu nimen, nimen jiu xiangxin tamenle ma? Ta bi shi nimen de toumu, shi ta chuanshou nimen de moshu, nimen bujiu jiu zhidao, wo bi jiaohuzhe kan nimen de shou he jiao, wo bi jiang nimen quanti ding zai shizijia shang.”
26|50|Tamen shuo:“Na ye mei shenme, women jiang guiyu women de zhu.
26|51|Women dique kewang women de zhu she you women de guoshi, yinwei women shi shouxian gui xin de.”
26|52|Wo ceng qishi mu sa (shuo):“Ni zai yejian shuailing wo de puren er luxing, nimen que shi bei zhuigan de.”
26|53|Falao paiqian zhaomu zhe dao ge chengshi qu.
26|54|Ta shuo:“Zhexie ren que shi yi xiao cuo ren.
26|55|Tamen queshi jinule wo,
26|56|women que shi jinshen de tuanti.”
26|57|Wo jiu shi tamen likai xuduo yuanpu he yuanquan,
26|58|caibao he gaogui de zhuzhai.
26|59|(Shiqing) jiushi zheyang de. Wo shi yiselie de houyi jicheng ta,
26|60|diren zai ri chu shi gan shangle tamen.
26|61|Dang liang jun xiang wang de shihou, mu sa de tonghuomen shuo:“Women shi bi yao bei diren zhui shang.”
26|62|Ta shuo:“Jue bu hui de! Wo de zhu tong wo zai yiqi, ta jiang yindao wo.”
26|63|Wo qishi mu sa shuo:“Ni yingdang yong ni de shouzhang ji hai.” Hai jiu lie kai, mei yibufen, xiang yizuo dashan.
26|64|Zai nali, wo rang naxie ren bijin (tamen).
26|65|Wo zhengjiu mu sa he ta de quanti.
26|66|Ranhou, yan sile qiyu de ren.
26|67|Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen daban bushi xindao zhe.
26|68|Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
26|69|Ni yingdang dui tamen xuandu yi bo la xin de gushi.
26|70|Dangri, ta dui ta de fuqin he zongzu shuo:“Nimen chongbai shenme?”
26|71|Tamen shuo:“Women chongbai ouxiang, women yizhi shi qiancheng de.”
26|72|Ta shuo:“Nimen qidao de shihou, tamen neng tingjian ma?
26|73|Tamen neng jiang fu yu nimen, huo jiang huo yu nimen ma?”
26|74|Tamen shuo:“Buran, women ceng faxian women de zuxian shi nayang zuo de.”
26|75|Ta shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen suo chongbai de shi shenme?
26|76|Nimen zui gu de zuxian suo chongbai de shi shenme?
26|77|Tamen que shi wo de choudi, wei zhong shijie de zhu ze buran.
26|78|Ta shi chuangzao wo de, ranhou yindao wo.
26|79|Ta shi gong wo shi, gong wo yin de.
26|80|Wo haibing shi, shi ta shi wo quanyu de.
26|81|Ta jiang shi wo si, ranhou shi wo fuhuo.
26|82|Wo xiwang ta zai baoying ri she you wo de guoshi.
26|83|Zhu a! Qiu ni ci wo zhihui, qiu ni shi wo jinru shanren de hanglie.
26|84|Qiu ni wei wo zai hou ren zhong liu yige ling ming.
26|85|Qiu ni shi wo wei ji leyuan de jicheng zhe.
26|86|Qiu ni she you wo de fuqin, ta que shi mi wu de.
26|87|Qiu ni buyao lingru wo, zai tamen bei fuhuo zhi ri,
26|88|ji caichan he zisun dou wu biyi zhi ri.
26|89|Wei daizhe yi ke chunjie de xin lai jian an la zhe,(de qi biyi).
26|90|Leyuan jiang bei dai dao jingwei zhe de fujin.
26|91|Huo yu jiang bei chenlie zai xie'e zhe de mianqian.
26|92|Jiangyao xiang tamen shuo:“Nimen yiqian she an la er chongbai de, rujin zai nali ne?
26|93|Tamen neng zhu nimen ne? Haishi tamen neng zizhu ne?”
26|94|Jiang bei touru huo yu zhong de, shi tamen he mi wu zhe,
26|95|yiji yi bo lie si de yixie budui.
26|96|Tamen zai huo yu zhong zhengbianzhe shuo:
26|97|“Zhi an la fashi, yiqian, women queshi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.
26|98|Dangri, women shi nimen yu zhong shijie de zhu tong shou chongbai.
26|99|Weiyou fanzui zhe shi women mi wu.
26|100|Suoyi women jue meiyou shuo qing zhe,
26|101|ye meiyou zhongshi de pengyou.
26|102|Dan yuan women jiang fanhui chenshi, women jiangyao bian cheng xindao zhe.”
26|103|Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bushi xindao de.
26|104|Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
26|105|Nu ha de zongzu ceng fouren shizhe.
26|106|Dangshi, tamen de dixiong nu ha dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei an la ni?
26|107|Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe.
26|108|Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|109|Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi you zhong shijie de zhu fudan.
26|110|Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.”
26|111|Tamen shuo:“Yixie beijian de ren zhuisui ni, women zen neng xinyang ni ne?”
26|112|Ta shuo:“Wo bu zhidao tamen zuole shenme shi.
26|113|Wo de zhu fuze qingsuan tamen, jiaruo nimen zhidao.
26|114|Wo jue buneng quzhu xinshi,
26|115|wo zhishi yige zhishuai de jinggao zhe.”
26|116|Tamen shuo:“Nu ha a! Ruguo ni bu tingzhi (xuanchuan), ni bi zao shi ji.”
26|117|Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de zongzu dique fouren wo.
26|118|Qiu ni zai wo yu tamen zhi jian jinxing caipan, qiu ni zhengjiu wo he tong wo zai yiqi de xinshimen.”
26|119|Wo jiu zhengjiule ta, yiji zai manzai de chuan zhong yu ta gong ji de ren.
26|120|Suihou wo ni shale qiyu de ren.
26|121|Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban buxin.
26|122|Ni de zhu, que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
26|123|A de ren ceng fouren shizhe.
26|124|Dangshi, tamen de dixiong hu de ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne?
26|125|Wo duiyu nimen, que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe.
26|126|Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|127|Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi you zhong shijie de zhu fudan.
26|128|Nimen zai gao dishang jianzhu yige jinian wu, yi gong youxi.
26|129|Nimen sheli yixie baolei, haoxiang nimen jiang yong ju chenshi yiyang.
26|130|Nimen chengzhi (tamen) de shihou, nimen shi hen canku de.
26|131|Nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|132|Nimen yingdang jingwei zhu, ta yi nimen suo zhidao de shangci nimen,
26|133|ta shangci nimen shengchu he zisi,
26|134|yuanpu he yuanquan
26|135|wo dique haipa nimen zaoshou zhongda ri de xingfa.”
26|136|Tamen shuo:“Wulun ni quangao yu fou, zhe duiyu women shi yiyang de.
26|137|Zhe buguo shi laoshengchangtan bale.
26|138|Women jue bu hui shou chengfa de.”
26|139|Tamen fouren ta, wo jiu huimiele tamen. Ci zhong dique you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de.
26|140|Ni de zhu, que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
26|141|Sai mo de ren ceng fouren shizhemen.
26|142|Dangri, tamen de dixiong sa li ha ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne?
26|143|Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe.
26|144|Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|145|Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou, wo de baochou, zhi you zhong shijie de zhu fudan.
26|146|Nandao jing rang nimen anxin di zai zhe huanjing zhong me?
26|147|Zhe li you yuanpu he yuanquan,
26|148|you zhuangjia he juyou xianxi de rou suihua xu de ye zao shu,
26|149|nimen jingqiao de zao shan zao wu.
26|150|Nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|151|Nimen buyao fucong guofen zhe de mingling,
26|152|tamen zai difang shang shangfengbaisu, er bu yifengyisu.”
26|153|Tamen shuo:“Ni zhishi yige shou guhuo de ren,
26|154|ni zhishi xiang women yiyang de fanren. Ni yingdang zhaoshi yige jixiang, ruguo ni shi chengshi de.”
26|155|Ta shuo:“Zhe shi yi zhi mu tuo, ta ying de yibufen yinliao, nimen ying de mou ding ri de yibufen yinliao.
26|156|Nimen buke shanghai ta, fouze, jiang zaoshou zhongda ri de chengfa.”
26|157|Dan tamen zaile ta, suihou, tamen shen jue huihen.
26|158|Dan tamen haishi shoule chengfa, ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bu xindao.
26|159|Ni de zhu, que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
26|160|Lu te de zongzu, ceng fouren shizhe.
26|161|Dangri, tamen de dixiong lu te ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne?
26|162|Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe.
26|163|Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|164|Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi gui zhong shijie de zhu fudan.
26|165|Nimen zenme yao yu zhongren zhong de nanxing jiaojie,
26|166|er sheqi nimen de zhu wei nimen chuangzao de qizi ni? Qishi, nimen shi fanzui de minzhong.”
26|167|Tamen shuo:“Lu te a! Ruguo ni bu tingzhi, ni bi zao fangzhu.”
26|168|Ta shuo:“Wo dique tonghen nimen de xingwei.
26|169|Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zhengjiu wo he wo de jiashu, shi women tuoli tamen de xingwei.”
26|170|Wo jiu zhengjiule ta he ta de quanjia.
26|171|Zhiyou yige lao fu ren chuwai, ta shuyu liu xia de ren.
26|172|Ranhou, wo huimiele qiyu de ren.
26|173|Wo jiangyu qu shang tamen, bei jinggao zhe suo zao de yu zai, zhen elie!
26|174|Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bushi xindao de.
26|175|Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
26|176|Conglin de jumin, ceng fouren shizhe.
26|177|Dangri, shu a bo ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne?
26|178|Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe.
26|179|Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|180|Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi gui zhong shijie de zhu fudan.
26|181|Nimen yingdang yong zu liang de sheng dou, buyao kekou.
26|182|Nimen yingdang yi gongping de cheng cheng wu.
26|183|Nimen buyao kekou taren suo ying de de caiwu. Nimen buyao zai difang shang weifeizuodai, bainong shifei.
26|184|Nimen yingdang jingwei an la, ta chuangzao nimen he gulao de shidai.”
26|185|Tamen shuo:“Ni zhishi yige bei guhuo de ren.
26|186|Ni zhishi yige xiang women yiyang de fanren. Women dique renwei ni shi yige shuohuang de.
26|187|Ni shi tian yikuai kuai di luo zai women de tou shang ba, ruguo ni shi chengshi de.”
26|188|Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu shi zui zhidao nimen de xingwei de.”
26|189|Tamen fouren ta. Tamen jiu zaoshou yinying zhi ri de xingfa. Na que shi zhongda ri de xingfa.
26|190|Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de.
26|191|Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
26|192|Zhe “gulanjing” que shi zhong shijie de zhu suo qishi de.
26|193|Na zhongshi de jingshen ba ta jiang shi zai ni de xin shang,
26|194|yibian ni jinggao zhongren,
26|195|yi mingbai de alabo yu.
26|196|Ta que shi gudai jingdian zhong bei ti daoguo de.
26|197|Yiselie houyi zhong de xuezhe zhidao ta, zhe nandao huan bu keyi zuo tamen de yige jixiang ma?
26|198|Jiaruo wo ba ta jiang shi gei yige fei alabo ren,
26|199|er nage ren dui tamen xuandu ta, name, tamen jue bu hui xinyang ta.
26|200|Wo zheyang shi fanzui de ren chang huai fouren de yinian.
26|201|Tamen bu xinyang ta, zhidao tamen kanjian tongku de xingfa.
26|202|Na zhong xingfa jiang zai tamen buzhi bu jue de shihou, huran jianglin tamen.
26|203|Tamen jiang shuo:“Women jiang meng kuanxian ma?”
26|204|Nandao tamen yaoqiu wo de xingfa zaori shixian ma?
26|205|Ni gaosu wo ba, ruguo wo rang tamen xiangshou ruogan nian,
26|206|ranhou, tamen suo bei jinggao de xingfa jianglin tamen,
26|207|name, tamen yiqian suo xiangshou de, duiyu tamen, jiujing you she me haochu ne?
26|208|Wo bu huimie renhe chengshi, chufei na chengshi li yi youguo ruogan jinggao zhe,
26|209|qu jiaohui qizhong de jumin; wo bushi bu yi de.
26|210|Emomen meiyou daizhe ta jiangxia.
26|211|Na duiyu tamen ji bushi shiyi de, ye bushi tamen suo neng de.
26|212|Tamen que shi bei quzhu er bude yu wen de.
26|213|Chu an la wai, ni buyao qidao bie de shenling, yimian ni zaoshou xingfa.
26|214|Ni yingdang jinggao ni de qinqi.
26|215|Ni duiyu gensui ni di naxie xinshi, yingdang jiayi ci'ai.
26|216|Ruguo ni de qinqi weikang ni, ni yingdang shuo:“Wo duiyu nimen de xingwei que shi wugan de.”
26|217|Ni yingdang tuo kao wanneng de, zhi ci de zhu.
26|218|Ni qili de shihou, ta kanjian ni,
26|219|erqie kanjian ni lu zhong libai de zhongzhong dongzuo.
26|220|Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quanzhi de.
26|221|Wo gaosu nimen, emomen fu zai shei de shenshang, hao ma?
26|222|Emomen fu zai mei ge zaoyao de zuiren shenshang.
26|223|Tamen ze er er ting, tamen daban shi shuohuang de.
26|224|Shirenmen bei mi wu zhe suo gensui.
26|225|Ni bu zhidao ma? Tamen zai ge shangu zhong fanghuang.
26|226|Tamen zhi shang kongtan, bu chong shijian.
26|227|Wei xindao er xingshan bing duo jinian an la, erqie zai qiya zhihou congshi ziwei de ren chuwai, bu yi zhe, jianglai jiu zhidao tamen huode shenme guisu.
27|1|Ta, xin. Zhexie shi “gulanjing”——panbie zhen wei de jingdian——de jie wen,
27|2|shi xinshimen de xiangdao he jiayin.
27|3|Xindao zhe jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, duxin houshi.
27|4|Buxin houshi zhe, wo que yi wei tamen er zhuangshile tamen de xingwei, gu tamen shi paihuai qitu de.
27|5|Zhe deng ren shi ying shou yanxing de, tamen zai houshi shi zui kui she de.
27|6|Ni que yi feng dao cong zhi rui quanzhi de zhu jiang shi de “gulanjing”.
27|7|Dangri, mu sa ceng dui ta de jiashu shuo:“Wo que yi kanjian yi chu huoguang, wo jiang cong you huo di difang dai yige xiaoxi lai gei nimen, huo na yige huoba lai gei nimen kaohuo.”
27|8|Ta daole nage huo de fujin, jiu you shengyin hanjiao ta shuo:“Zai huo de fujin he sizhou de ren, dou meng fu you. Zansong an la——zhong shijie de zhu, chaojue wanwu.
27|9|Mu sa a! Wo que shi an la——wanneng de, zhi rui de zhu.
27|10|Ni pao xia ni de shouzhang ba!” Dang ta kanjian na tiao shouzhang wan yan ru she shi, jiu zhuanlian taobi, bu gan huigu.“Mu sa a! Buyao weiju, shizhemen zai wo zheli, que shi bu weiju de.
27|11|Ji xing bu yi, ranhou gaiguo cong shan zhe chuwai, wo (duiyu ta) que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.

27|12|Ni bashou charu ni de huai zhong, ranhou, chou chulai ta jiang bailiang liang de, que wu eji. Zhe shi pai ni qu zhaoshi falao he ta de baixing de jiu zhong jixiang zhi yi. Tamen que shi youzui de minzhong.”
27|13|Wo de xuduo mingxian de jixiang jianglin tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi mingxian de moshu.”
27|14|Tamen neixin chengren naxie jixiang, dan tamen wei bu yi he aoman er fouren ta. Ni kan bainong shifei zhe de jieju shi zenyang de.
27|15|Wo que yi ba xuewen shangci da wude he su lai man, ta lia shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la! Ta ceng shi women chaoyue ta de xuduo xindao de puren.”
27|16|Su lai man jicheng da wude; ta shuo:“Zhongren a! Women ceng xuehui bai niao de yuyan, women ceng huode wanwu de xiangshou, zhe que shi mingxian de enhui.”
27|17|Su lai man de dajun——you jingling, renlei, niao lei zucheng——bei zhaoji dao ta de mianqian, tamen shi bushu zhengqi de.
27|18|Dengdao tamen lai daole yi gu de shihou, yige mu yi shuo:“Mayimen a! Kuai jin ziji de zhuchu qu, yimian bei su lai man he ta de dajun buzhi bu jue de jianta.”

27|19|Su lai man wei ta dehua er chayi di weixiaole, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni qishi wo, shi wo changchang ganxie ni suo ci wo he wo fumu de enhui, bing shi wo changchang zuo ni suo xiyue de shangong, qiu ni jie ni de enhui shi wo de ru ni de shanliang de puren zhi lie.”
27|20|Ta ceng jianyue zhong niao, ta shuo:“Wo zenme bujian dai sheng ne? Ta quexi ma?
27|21|Wo biding yanli de chengzhi ta, huo sha diao ta, chufei ta dai yige mingzheng lai gei wo.”
27|22|Ta douliu bujiu, jiu laile, ta shuo:“Wo zhidaole ni bu zhidao de shi, wo cong sai bai yi dai laile yige queshi de xiaoxi gei ni.
27|23|Wo que yi faxian yige fu ren, tongzhi yizu ren, ta huode wanwu de xiangshou, ta you yige pangda de baozuo.
27|24|Wo faxian ta he ta de chenmin dou she an la er chongbai taiyang, emo ceng yi tamen de xingwei mihuo tamen, yizhi zu'ai tamen zou shang zhengdao, suoyi tamen bu zunxun zhengdao.
27|25|Tamen bu wei an la er koutou——jieshi tiandi aomi, erqie shen zhi nimen suo yinhui he biaobai de zhu.
27|26|An la, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai zhe, ta shi weida de baozuo de zhu.”
27|27|Ta shuo:“Wo yao kan kan ni jiujing shi chengshi de, haishi shuohuang de.
27|28|Ni ba wo zhe feng xin dai qu tou gei tamen, ranhou, likai tamen, ni shikan tamen ruhe dafu.”
27|29|Ta shuo:“Chen pumen a! Wo jie dao yi feng guizhong de xin.
27|30|Zhe feng xin que shi su lai man ji lai de, zhe feng de neirong shi:‘Feng zhiren zhi ci de an la zhi ming.
27|31|Nimen buyao dui wo aoman wu li, nimen yingdang lai guishun wo.’”
27|32|Ta shuo:“Chen pumen a! Guanyu wo de shi, wang nimen chu ge yijian. Wo conglai bu jueding renhe yi jian shi, zhidao nimen zai wo mianqian.”
27|33|Tamen shuo:“Women ji you wuli, you you yongqi. Women dui ni wei ming shi cong, qing ni xiang yi xiang, ni yao women zuo shenme.”
27|34|Ta shuo:“Guowangmen mei gong ru yige chengshi, bi pohuai qizhong de jianshe, bi shi qizhong de guizu bian cheng jianmin, tamen zhexie ren, ye hui zheyang zuo de.
27|35|Wo biding yao pai ren song liwu qu gei tamen, ranhou, dengdaizhuo kan shi chen dai hui shenme xiaoxi lai.”

27|36|Dang shizhe daole su lai man de mianqian de shihou, ta shuo:“Nimen zenme yi caichan lai zizhu wo ne? An la suo ci wo de, shengguo ta suo ci nimen de. Buran, nimen wei nimen de liwu er yangyang deyi.
27|37|Ni zhuan huiqu ba, wo biding tongshuai tamen wufa dikang de jundui qu taofa tamen, wo biding ba tamen beijian de zhu chu jingwai, shi tamen chengwei shou lingru de.”
27|38|Ta shuo:“Chenminmen a! Zai tamen lai guishun wo zhiqian, nimen zhong you shei neng ba ta de baozuo na lai gei wo ne?”
27|39|Yige qiangliang de jingling shuo:“Zai ni li xi zhiqian, wo ba ta na lai gei ni. Wo duiyu zhe jian shi, que shi ji neng sheng ren, you zhongshi kekao de.”

27|40|Na shen zhi tian jing de ren shuo:“Zhuan shunjian, wo jiu ba ta na lai gei ni.” Dang ta kanjian nage baozuo anzhi zai ta mianqian de shihou, ta shuo:“Zhe shi wo de zhu de enhui zhi yi, ta yu yi ci shiyan wo, kan wo shi ganxie zhe, haishi gufu zhe. Ganxie zhe, zhi wei ziji de liyi er ganxie; gufu zhe,(xuzhi) wo de zhu que shi wu qiu de, que shi zun rong de.”
27|41|Ta shuo:“Nimen ba ta de baozuo gaizhuang yixia, yibian women kan ta neng fou renshi ziji de baozuo.”
27|42|Dang ta daolai de shihou, youren shuo:“Ni de baozuo xiang zheyang ma?” Ta shuo:“Zhe haoxiang shi wo de baozuo.” Zai ta zhiqian, women yi huode zhishi, women yi shi guishun de.
27|43|Ta she an la er chongbai de, fang'ai ta, ta ben shi shuyu bu xindao de minzhong.

27|44|Youren dui ta shuo:“Ni jin na zuo gongdian qu ba!” Dang ta kanjian na zuo gongdian de shihou, ta yiwei gongdian li yipian wangyang,(jiu tiqi yishang) luchu ta de liang xiaotui, ta shuo:“Zhe que shi yong boli zaocheng de guanghua de gongdian.” Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que shi zi qi de, wo (xianzai) genzhe su lai man guishun an la——zhong shijie de zhu.”
27|45|Wo que yi paiqian sai mo de ren de dixiong——sa li ha——qu jiaohua tamen (shuo):“Nimen yingdang chongbai an la.” Tamen like fencheng liang pai, huxiang zhenglun.
27|46|Ta shuo:“Wo de zongzu a! Nimen weisheme zai enhui zhiqian yaoqiu xingfa zaori shixian ne? Nimen zenme bu xiang an la qiurao, yibian nimen meng zhu de lianmin ne?”
27|47|Tamen shuo:“Women wei ni he ni de xintu er zao e yun.” Ta shuo:“Nimen de e yun shi an la zhuding de. Buran, nimen shi yao shou kaoyan de.”
27|48|Dangri, cheng li you jiu huo ren, zai difang shang shangfengbaisu, er bu yifengyisu,

27|49|tamen shuo:“Nimen zhi an la huxiang mengshi ba!” Tamen shuo:“Women biding zai yejian mouhai ta he ta de xintu. Ranhou, women bi dui ta de zhu shuo:‘Ta de xintu yuhai de shihou, women meiyou zaichang, women que shi chengshi de ren.”
27|50|Tamen ceng yong yige jimou, wo ye ceng yong yige jimou, dan tamen buzhi bu jue.
27|51|Ni kan tamen de jimou de jieju shi zenyang de.(Jieguo) shi wo ba tamen he tamen de zongzu, quanti huimiele.
27|52|Naxie shi tamen de fangwu, yin tamen de bu yi er bian cheng wei tanta de. Duiyu you zhishi de minzhong ci zhong que you yige jixiang.
27|53|Wo ceng zhengjiule xindao erqie jingwei de renmen.
27|54|(Wo ceng) paiqian lu te, dangri, ta dui ta de zongzu shuo:“Nimen zenme mingmuzhangdan de gan choushi ne?
27|55|Nimen wubi yao she nuren er yi nanren manzu xingyu ma? Buran, nimen shi wu zhishi de minzhong.”
